name: CATNIP PANIC! - Ludum Dare 46
description:
In CATNIP PANIC! You play as April, a girl who's out to save her catnip plant from withering away!

Go Left to get tools and healing bread.

Go Down to get Water to keep your plant from withering.

Go Right to gather fertiliser to grow your Plant.

Keep your plant alive while avoiding the threats of the great outdoors!

Move: WASD / Joystick

Interact (Pickup/Use Tools): Mouse 1 / Controller A

Drop Tool: Space / Right click / Controller B

Wear / Eat: E / Middle Click / Controller X

Easy mode recommended for a quick play-through.
